title: Syllabus mentioned in ERP
text: Introduction to Traffic Engineering, Components of Traffic System and their Characteristics, Traffic Control Devices, Traffic Facilities and Traffic Stream Characteristics, Traffic Studies and Analysis, Capacity and Level of Service: Freeways Multilane Highways, and Two-lane Two-way Rural Highways, Introduction to Intersection Control, Basic Principles of Intersection Signalization, Capacity and Level of Service of Signalized Intersection, Fundamentals of Signal Timing and Design
